name: SPACE SAMURAI (Zanilo ಠ_ಠ)
description:
The Space Shogun is dead.

Each planet tried to seize power after the fall of the shogunate and a civil war ravaged the galaxy. The elite squadron of space samurai perished in battle. But a shadow rose taking advantage from the  destruction seeking to devour all the worlds.

You are the last surviving space samurai. 

Fight against the Scourge and protect the galaxy!

PCGAMEBOYArrowsArrows ButtonsZA 
  • Press Z to shoot.

Space Samurai is a shoot em' up gameboy game made by Danilo Mattos using Chris Maltby’s GB Studio engine. The game comes as a ROM file, you can download it to play in an emulator or on an original Gameboy using a flashcart or an emulation cartridge.

Space Samurai is based on a college game project programmed using arduino, and you can see the original game in this link - https://www.behance.net/gallery/74388137/PUC-Rio-INF1030-CONCEITOS-DE-INFORMATIC...

You can see more projects and pixel art at - https://twitter.com/Dankdandandan

Art & Game Design by Danilo Mattos.

Made with GBStudio.
